theme.$description: Deep navy blue with gold accents - premium, authoritative, and trustworthy theme for enterprise applications

default.$description: Primary text on dark surfaces - near white for readability

muted.$description: Secondary text - cool gray for less important content

inverted.$description: Text color for light surfaces - deep navy

link.hover.$description: Link text color on hover - amber gold

default.$description: Default surface background - deep navy (near black)

raised.$description: Elevated surface background - lighter navy for cards

sunken.$description: Depressed surface background - even darker navy for inputs

overlay.$description: Overlay background for modals and backdrops - semi-transparent navy

subtle.$description: Subtle border for dividers - faint navy

strong.$description: Stronger border for emphasis - visible navy-gray

primary.$description: Primary interactive element color - metallic gold

primary.hover.$description: Primary interactive color on hover - lighter gold

secondary.$description: Secondary interactive element color - slate gray

ring.$description: Focus ring outline color - gold glow

success.$description: Success state color - emerald green for dark theme

error.$description: Error state color - soft coral red

dropdown.$description: Dropdown menu elevation shadow - deep shadow for dark theme

modal.$description: Modal dialog elevation shadow - most prominent

focus.$description: Focus ring glow shadow - gold glow ring
